chatexchange.command.chatexchange.descri:
§3§lChatExchange Help§r
If the server has enabled broadcasting chat messages, your chat messages will be broadcast to an external port by default.
You can use /chatexchange broadcastme to control whether your chat messages will be broadcast.
Also, you can broadcast your messages by prefixing %s.
chatexchange.command.chatexchange.broadc: Your chat messages will now be broadcast.
Your chat messages will not be broadcast.
Your chat messages are currently being broadcast.
Your chat messages are currently not being broadcast.
